description: Try our easy to follow Roast Chicken & Crunchy Noodle Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Noodle salad,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free,Father's Day
name: Roast Chicken & Crunchy Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove meat from chicken and discard skin and bones. Shred chicken meat. In a large bowl, mix together fish sauce, lime juice, sugar and chilli. Add cabbage, carrot and onion. Mix well.
Toss chicken with salad. Cover and chill for at least 30 minutes.
Add herbs and noodles and serve.
